statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -4 \\ 4 \\ -16 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 7 \\ -7 \\ 28 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 8 \\ -8 \\ 25 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -8 \\ 8 \\ -18 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
